get.summary: Get form fields based on classification filters
get.description: Returns dynamic form fields for the given classification filters such as category, subCategory, sector, activity, subActivity, entity, and incubator.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Slug of the category (required)

parameters.name: subCategory
parameters.description: Slug of the sub-category (optional)

parameters.name: sector
parameters.description: Slug of the sector (optional)

parameters.name: activity
parameters.description: Slug of the activity (optional)

parameters.name: subActivity
parameters.description: Slug of the sub-activity (optional)

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: Slug of the entity (optional)

parameters.name: incubator
parameters.description: Slug of the incubator (optional)

parameters.name: search

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: No of entries in single page
